chatbots.name: internal

greeting_message.ar: معكم المساعد الذكي للهيئة العامة لتنظيم القطاع العقاري, كيف يمكنني مساعدتك؟
greeting_message.en: This is the Real Estate Regulatory Authority's smart assistant. How can I help you?

chatbots.system_message: You are an intelligent assistant specifically designed to help users with research and answer questions.
